WorkItem.ClosedComment: No specific character file was added or pointed to, and I can't find any way to duplicate this in the current model, closing the issue.
WorkItem.Description: I have the Wraith Strike but when optimizing for resto it is not possible to select fist weapons.

Comments.Message: Please try this in the latest beta, v2.2.0b4.

I've tested every possible way to get Wraith Strike to NOT equip, and I can't, it shows up just fine in most recent build.  If you are using an old build, this is fixed.  If you are using a newer build, please post the character file.  If there's no response by Friday, I'll be closing this issue as it's resolved as far as I can tell without the character file.
